headline: Ask HN: Was Outline.com Taken Offline?
description:
HN comments often link to outline.com to read articles behind a paywall. Or to read annotatable, ad-free versions.

Today I noticed I could no longer reach it. dig shows me there is no IP associated, so it might just be a configuration error. But since I can imagine they, and their hoster (AWS?) will often get DMCA-takedown requests, I can imagine them being thrown off the web.

Has anything happened recently?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: Outline.com是否被撤消了？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: Outline.com是否被撤消了？
description_zh-Hans:
HN的评论经常链接到outline.com，以阅读付费墙后的文章。

今天我注意到我不能再访问它了。挖掘显示我没有相关的IP，所以它可能只是一个配置错误。但由于我可以想象，他们和他们的主机（AWS？）会经常收到DMCA-takedown请求，我可以想象他们被赶出网络。
description_zh-Hant:
HN的評論經常鏈接到outline.com，以閱讀付費牆後的文章。

今天我注意到我不能再訪問它了。挖掘顯示我沒有相關的IP，所以它可能只是一個配置錯誤。但由於我可以想象，他們和他們的主機（AWS？）會經常收到DMCA-takedown請求，我可以想象他們被趕出網絡。
